Animal.title: The polar bear is a large and carnivorous mammal that lives in the Arctic region. It is known for its white fur and distinctive hunting habits.
The lion is a majestic and carnivorous mammal that lives in savannas and grasslands. It is known for its distinctive mane and social behavior.
The tiger is a large and carnivorous mammal that lives in forests and grasslands. It is known for its distinctive stripes and powerful hunting habits.
The fox is a small and omnivorous mammal that lives in forests and grasslands. It is known for its distinctive red fur and cunning behavior.
The wolf is a large and carnivorous mammal that lives in forests and grasslands. It is known for its distinctive howl and social behavior.
